ygData.subject: RE: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: It worth more than 15-20 pp that is for sure.  Maybe not 30-45pp over a combine longsword - but at least the same price, or about 10 pp more.
ygData.messageBody:
It worth more than 15-20 pp that is for sure. Maybe not 30-45pp over a
combine longsword - but at least the same price, or about 10 pp more.


> ----------
> From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)[SMTP:kblair@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 8:12 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk
>
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> > Combine Longsword: Damage 6, 28 delay, hits magical creatures
> > Dragoon Dirk: Damage 6, 23 delay, +2 dexterity, +3 magic.
> >
> > Hands down Dirk is way better.
>
> I never questioned or debated the fact that a Dirk is better than a
> combine.
> I said that I didn't feel that the differences between the two were worth
> an
> extra 30-45pp. And I still stand by that. Is the Dirk a better weapon?
> Surely. Is it worth 30-45pp MORE than a Combine weapon to me? Definitely
> not.
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to people who share your interests.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
